name: Mdposteforumscreator
tagline: Fill the form and it automagically creates WP posts and BBPress forums with that data
body:
### Welcome to MaisDesign Post & Forums Creator.
The idea is really simple, sometimes we have users who are too lazy to do things.
With this plugin they'll be able to create WordPress posts and BBPress forums only inserting their title in the form.
Then they'll have to create the content but posts and forums will be ready in Draft status.

### Interface
Actually the interface is really basic as you can see.
![First Interface](http://i.imgur.com/RD0FLyw.png?1)

### Future improvement
* Add the possibility to also write and publish content from there.
* Add BuddyPress Support
* Create more then 1 post in a single click

### Known Bugs
Everything, actually it doesn't work.

### Authors and Contributors
@maisdesign and Stestaz(maybe one day he'll register to GitHub).

### Support or Contact
Use GitHub Issue page or email me: marco  @ maisdesign  .it
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
